title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message:
so I have this board, doesnt look liquid damaged, i press power button, the macbook will be shutdown, while at the same time, orange light go green light, which  I have read before, is smc_Reset_l being dragged by smc_onoff_l is it ?
I have tried known good bottom case with new trackpad and keyboard flex but still the same, so I assume it will be logicboard problem
smc_onoff_l is 3.4v, and drop when shorted, I have tried changing u5110
note : I have tried shorting power pads and power button from keyboard, still the same

title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message: whole board looks pristine, just a bit of dust here and there, j4800 looks clean, is this smc problem?

title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message:
Post SMC_LSOC_RST_L level.
Try R5115/16 pads (instead of power button), with trackpad flex disconnected; same issue?

title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message:
smc_lsoc_reset_l is 380mv, the caps is not shorted
i have tried with r5115/16t pads with only board , but still the same

title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message:
"smc_lsoc_reset_l is 380mv"
That is the problem.
Everytime you pull down SMC_ONOFF_L, you trigger SMC reset in fact.
If still low when remove C4836, then bad U5110, TP flex/board, or J4800.

title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message: I tried removing c4836, replacing u5110, and removing the j4800 and tried smc on off, but smc reset_l is still dragged down

title: 820-00164a power button doesnt work
message: Sorry, there's a bridge at my j4800, now its working, thanks a lot!
